title: [SOLVED]820-2936-A Doesn't load
message: I have 820-2936-A that doesn't load any drive at all. I've tried external usb hard drive but it just stays at 75 prosent when loading. Can't run ASD because of the issue.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-A Doesn't load
message:
Got the ASD running.  [COLOR=#454545][FONT=Helvetica]VP0R PBus test1 Sensor reading below low point. Only one error.

When its plugged to charger it works just fine without any issues but when it runs from battery its slow...[/FONT][/COLOR]

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-A Doesn't load
message: Fixed the issue. Corrosion around Q5300. Pin 3 had a broken line and the R5301 resistor was bad. Now works fine!
